Class ItemNeighborhood<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.item.neighborhood.ItemNeighborhood<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, FastItemIndex<I>, Neighborhood
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CachedItemNeighborhood, InvertedItemNeighborhood, ThresholdItemNeighborhood, TopKItemNeighborhood

    public abstract class ItemNeighborhood<I>
extends Object
implements Neighborhood, FastItemIndex<I>
    Item neighborhood. Wraps a generic neighborhood and a fast item index.
